text: The U23 World Wrestling Championships are the Amateur Wrestling World Championship for athletes under 23 years old and is organized by United World Wrestling. The tournament began in 2017. ==Competitions== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; font-size:90%" !rowspan=2 style="width: 50px; background-color:#C0C0C0"|Year!!rowspan=2 style="width: 160px; background- color:#C0C0C0"|Dates!!rowspan=2 style="width: 240px; background- color:#C0C0C0"|City and host country!!colspan=3 style="width: 450px; background-color:#C0C0C0"|Team champion |- !style="width: 150px; background- color:#C0C0C0"|Men's freestyle!!style="width: 150px; background- color:#C0C0C0"|Men's Greco-Roman!!style="width: 150px; background- color:#C0C0C0"|Women's freestyle |- | 2017 | November 21–26 | align="left"| Bydgoszcz, Poland | align="left"| | align="left"| | align="left"| |-bgcolor="efefef" | 2018 | November 12–18 | align="left"| Bucharest, Romania | align="left"| | align="left"| | align="left"| |- | 2019 | October 28 – November 3 | align="left"| Budapest, Hungary | align="left"| | align="left"| | align="left"| |- | 2020 | November 23–29 | align="left"| Tampere, Finland | align="left"| | align="left"| | align="left"| |- | 2021 | November 1–7 | align="left"| Belgrade, Serbia | align="left"| | align="left"| | align="left"| |} ==All-time medal table== All-time medal count, as of the 2019 World U23 Wrestling Championship. ==See also== * Wrestling World Cup * World Wrestling Championships * World wrestling clubs Cup * List of World Championships medalists in wrestling (freestyle) * List of World Championships medalists in wrestling (Greco-Roman) * List of World Championships medalists in wrestling (women) * List of World and Olympic Champions in Greco-Roman wrestling * List of World and Olympic Champions in men's freestyle wrestling * World Beach Wrestling Championships ==References== * United World Wrestling Database Category:Wrestling competitions Wrestling Category:Under-23 sports competitions Category:World youth sports competitions Category:Recurring sporting events established in 2017
title: U23 World Wrestling Championships
